response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $1,200,000 to me, reflecting its unique features and the effort put into its creation. I am now extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. I trust that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations, adding significant value to your collection or business. Should you choose to accept this offer, please let me know, and we will proceed with the transaction promptly. Thank you for considering this remarkable opportunity.", "product_price": 1100000}
